CustomField.description: INTEG - N || ** eBay Advertising ** || WF - N || AP - N || VAL - N ||Class - N || Definition: Discount || 00477099 |
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, 'CPM') && ISBLANK( TEXT(Targeting_Type__c )), ( (UnitPrice * Quantity__c) / 1000) - ((SalesPriceNet__c * Quantity__c) / 1000),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, 'CPD') && ISBLANK( TEXT(Targeting_Type__c )), (UnitPrice * Quantity__c) - (SalesPriceNet__c * Quantity__c),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, 'CPC') && ISBLANK( TEXT(Targeting_Type__c )), (UnitPrice * Quantity__c) - (SalesPriceNet__c * Quantity__c),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, 'FIXED') && ISBLANK( TEXT(Targeting_Type__c )), (UnitPrice * Quantity__c) - (SalesPriceNet__c * Quantity__c), 0
))))
CustomField.label: Discount
